entry.source: I'd like to have an {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0} in order to do{F801}some maintenance belowground, but since they{F801}aren't being made anymore, they're as precious{F801}as diamonds now. People will kill to get their{F801}hands on one! I've heard there are some in a{F801}{F804,5}store in Ueno,{F804,0} but a demon has a Domain there.{F801}
